cast.overview: In the future, an outbreak of canine flu leads the mayor of a Japanese city to banish all dogs to an island used as a garbage dump. The outcasts must soon embark on an epic journey when a 12-year-old boy arrives on the island to find his beloved pet.
cast.title: Isle of Dogs

details.biography: Taichi Kodama (こだまたいち, Kodama Taichi, March 31, 1991) is a Japanese actor and musician from Aichi Prefecture. He was a Men's Non-no model from 2012 to 2018, and is currently active as a guitarist for THE TOKYO and a solo folk singer in addition to being an actor. Recent works include the TV drama and film versions of Prince of Legend. He also apperas in the film Little Nights, Little Love, in which he plays a street musician.
details.name: Taichi Kodama
